Involved in the Platform and UI development of a brand new version of an existing web application current referred as NGSPA.
Responsible for overseeing and ensuring the functionality for the assigned store is up to standard as well as dealing with any unresolved issues.
Researched and designed a fully functional pizza website that is linked to a database using MySQL, JavaScript and PHP.
Researched and developed an Android Application called Study Guide that is meant to help students store individual notes and play quiz like games based on those notes.
Researched and designed a web interface which is connected to the company\'s Artificial Intelligence as well as being user-friendly based on the client\'s feedbacks.
Researched extensively trends and news in the computer science industry and published critical articles concerning the topics to boost company\'s online presence.
